title: Veganerie Bakery - EmQuartier
description: Second location of this vegan bakery, opened Mar 2015 inside EmQuartier District shopping center, on the G floor, one of the stands outside the supermarket. The counter offers a varied range of freshly baked vegan pastries and sweets.
streetAddress: 637 Sukhumvit Rd, EmQuartier District, M floor, Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana
